General.Name: Tunas Baru Lampung Tbk
General.Description: PT Tunas Baru Lampung Tbk primarily manufactures and sells vegetable cooking oils in Indonesia. It operates through Plantations and Manufacturing segments. The company offers palm cooking oil, soaps, palm kernel oil, crude palm oil, stearine, palm fatty acid distillate, glycerin, margarine, molasses, FAME, palm and copra chips/expellers and pellets, slop fattu acid, and sugar, as well as laundry and cream soaps. It also engages in the plantation of palm oil and sugarcane. PT Tunas Baru Lampung Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
